data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mah, Christopher L. (2017): Overview of the Ferdina - like Goniasteridae (Echinodermata: Asteroidea) including a new subfamily, three new genera and fourteen new species. Zootaxa 4271 (1): 1-72, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4271.1.1|311 occurrences
